DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine pharmacokinetic profile Revlimid® patient present Multiple Myeloma impair renal function , safety Revlimid® enrol patient population . evaluate efficacy Revlimid®-Dexamethasone combination patient present MM impair renal function completion 3 cycle treatment .

DOC.criteria: Documented diagnosis relapse refractory multiple myeloma ( MM ) .
